timeline.author: AjayJagan

replies.bodyText: Yes! I just found the problem/solution elsewhere yesterday. The solution is not in the CSS, but in the SVG file. I see that inside the SVG file, the viewbox is set to "0 0 339.93 36.37". Right after that, add width="399.93px" height="36.37px" That should fix the problem.
replies.author: srambach

timeline.bodyText: Let's start using a modified BEM naming for CSS classes. I'd suggest .kogito-management-console--dashboard-page for this.
timeline.author: srambach

timeline.bodyText: If we are using a modified BEM naming for CSS classes. I'd suggest kogito-management-console--dashboard-page for this.
